abstract: With the sharp downturn on Wall Street, applications to the nation’s business schools are likely to a) fall, b) hold steady or c) rally like a tech stock in 1999?
snippet: With the sharp downturn on Wall Street, applications to the nation’s business schools are likely to a) fall, b) hold steady or c) rally like a tech stock in 1999?
lead_paragraph: HERE’S a pop quiz for the M.B.A. crowd: With the sharp downturn on Wall Street, applications to the nation’s business schools are likely to a) fall, b) hold steady or c) rally like a tech stock in 1999?

headline.main: In Tough Times, M.B.A. Applications May Be an Economic Indicator
headline.print_headline: In Tough Times, M.B.A. Applications May Be an Economic Indicator
